"""FileID: 1c08043d-e7db-44e4-9814-1f93e2d003c7"""
import utils
import heapq

class CallManager(object):
    """ID: 6dc12a39-9826-4459-ae4b-546b476b6945"""
    def __init__(self):
        """ID: 3aadd1c4-1135-4041-a834-feda26a5abd2"""
        self.calls = {}
        self.seq = 1


    def call(self,row,func_name,ns,params,inherit = False):
        """ID: 9099dc11-d899-499a-92bb-48725378d0fa"""
        dict_all = {}
        paramList = []
        for param in params:
            if isinstance(param ,dict):
                dict_all.update(param)
            else:
                paramList.append(param)
        if dict_all:
            paramList.append(dict_all)
        item = CallItem(row,self.seq,func_name,ns,paramList,inherit)
        if not self.calls.__contains__(ns):
            self.calls[ns] = []
        heapq.heappush(self.calls[ns],item)
        self.seq += 1

    def get(self,callNs):
        """ID: e39cf035-2571-439b-9bf6-1f8e3b0395ea"""
        if callNs in self.calls:
            return self.calls[callNs]
class CallItem(object):
    """ID: 69231a22-afa7-407e-8f16-20a00e70993f"""
    types = [
        utils.constants.FUN_DEF,
        utils.constants.CLS_DEF,
        utils.constants.EXT_DEF,
        utils.constants.NA_DEF
    ]

    def __init__(self,row :int,seq:int,funcDefi:str ,ns:str , params:set,inherit):
        """ID: 6610425e-51da-421a-99e9-b8747bc6b7f3"""
        self.row = row
        self.funcDefi = funcDefi
        self.seq = seq
        self.ns = ns
        self.params = params
    def get_ns(self):
        """ID: 029a487b-81d0-4acb-bb5d-d6461f3bc74c"""
        return self.ns

    def __lt__(self, other):
        """ID: 9005ddc9-dcb2-4ece-b1ea-6127782dc1f7"""
        return self.row < other.row or self.seq < other.seq
